net.derquinse.bocas.jdbc

Class JDBCBocasBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.derquinse.bocas.jdbc.JDBCBocasBuilder

  • public final class JDBCBocasBuilder
extends Object
    Builder class for Bocas buckets based on JDBC.
    Author:
    Andres Rodriguez.
